search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Unbounce (unbounce.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Unbounce is: [https://unbounce.com/pricing/](https://unbounce.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Unbounce Pricing and Plans—Start Your Free 14-Day Trial

extracted_content.content:
Unbounce Pricing and Plans—Start Your Free 14-Day Trial
===============

[![Image 22: unbounce](https://unbounce.com/wp-content/themes/unbounce2019/assets/img/unbounce.svg?v=1)![Image 24: unbounce](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)](https://unbounce.com/)

*   Products
    *   ##### Products and features
        
        Build, test, and optimize landing pages—all in one platform
        
        *   #### Landing pages
            
            [![Image 25: Landing-Pages](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)Landing pages Build pages with smart features that get more sales and signups](https://unbounce.com/product/landing-pages/)
            
        *   #### A/B testing
            
            [![Image 26: Apps icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)A/B testing A/B test your landing pages without a designer, developer, or deep pockets](https://unbounce.com/product/ab-testing-tool/)
            
        *   #### AI optimization
            
            [![Image 27: template icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)AI optimization Automatically send visitors to their best-match landing page](https://unbounce.com/product/smart-traffic/)
            
    *   ##### Products and features
        
        *   #### AI copywriting
            
            [![Image 28: Insightly icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)AI copywriting Instantly generate copy for your pages, ads, emails, and more](https://unbounce.com/product/smart-copy/)
            
        *   #### Integrations
            
            [![Image 29: LeadsRx icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)Integrations Connect your favorite marketing tools and add extra functionality](https://unbounce.com/product/integrations/)
            
        *   [#### Templates](https://unbounce.com/landing-page-templates/)
            
            [![Image 30: template icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)Templates Get started fast with hundreds of industry-optimized templates](https://unbounce.com/landing-page-templates/)
            
    *   ##### More solutions by Unbounce
        
        Empower your go-to-market teams to grow faster
        
        *   #### Insightly CRM
            
            [![Image 31: Insightly icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)Insightly CRM Scale pipeline management and turn leads into loyal customers faster](https://www.insightly.com/)
            
        *   #### LeadsRx marketing attribution
            
            [![Image 32: LeadsRx icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)LeadsRx marketing attribution Confidently measure and optimize high-converting channels](https://leadsrx.com/)
            
*   Solutions
    *   ##### Industries
        
        *   [![Image 33: Agencies icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)Agencies](https://unbounce.com/solutions/industry/agencies/)
        *    [![Image 34: Ecommerce icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Ecommerce](https://unbounce.com/solutions/industry/ecommerce/)
        *    [![Image 35: SaaS icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) SaaS](https://unbounce.com/solutions/industry/saas/)
        *    [![Image 36: Small Businesses icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Small businesses](https://unbounce.com/solutions/industry/small-businesses/)
        *    [![Image 37: B2B Marketing icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) B2B marketing](https://unbounce.com/solutions/industry/b2b-segment/)
        *    [![Image 38: Service Specialists icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Service specialists](https://unbounce.com/solutions/industry/professional-services/)
    *   ##### Use cases
        
        *    [![Image 39: PPC icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) PPC](https://unbounce.com/solutions/use-case/ppc/)
        *    [![Image 40: Social Ads icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Social ads](https://unbounce.com/solutions/use-case/social-ads/)
        *    [![Image 41: Email Marketingicon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Email marketing](https://unbounce.com/solutions/use-case/email-marketing/)
        *    [![Image 42: Lead Generation icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Lead generation](https://unbounce.com/solutions/use-case/lead-generation/)
    *   [##### Flexible limits and extra support](https://unbounce.com/concierge/)
        
        ##### Flexible limits and extra support
        
        Grow your marketing to any number of landing pages, visitors, and conversions [Learn more ![Image 43: arrow icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://unbounce.com/concierge/) 
        
        [![Image 44](data:image/gif;base64)](https://unbounce.com/concierge/)
        
*   [Pricing](https://unbounce.com/pricing/)
*   Resources
    *   ##### The essentials
        
        *   [![Image 45: Lead Generation icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)](https://unbounce.com/landing-page-articles/what-is-a-landing-page/)
            
            [###### What is a landing page? Start converting more of your traffic with our complete guide to landing pages](https://unbounce.com/landing-page-articles/what-is-a-landing-page/)
            
        *   [![Image 46: Lead Generation icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)](https://unbounce.com/landing-page-examples-built-with-unbounce/)
            
            [###### Landing page examples Use this collection of Unbounce-built examples to inspire your next campaign](https://unbounce.com/landing-page-examples-built-with-unbounce/)
            
        *   [![Image 47: Lead Generation icon](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)](https://unbounce.com/conversion-benchmark-report/)
            
            [###### Conversion benchmark report Get insights from over 57 million landing page conversions across various industries](https://unbounce.com/conversion-benchmark-report/)
            
    *   [##### Marketing resources](https://unbounce.com/conversion-benchmark-report/)
        
        ##### Marketing resources
        
        Learn to build high-converting marketing campaigns with our resource library  
        [See all resources ![Image 48: arrow icon](https://unbounce.com/pricing/image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://unbounce.com/resources/) 
        
        [![Image 49](data:image/gif;base64)](https://unbounce.com/conversion-benchmark-report/)
        
*   [Contact](https://unbounce.com/contact-us/)

 Search for:

*   [Log in](https://unbounce.com/product-selector/)
*   [Start building for free](https://unbounce.com/pricing/)
*   [Log into Smart Copy](https://copy.unbounce.com/)
*   [Sign Up For Free](http://copy.unbounce.com/register)
*   [Start My Free Trial](https://copy.unbounce.com/register)

CONCIERGE PLANS  
-----------------

Not finding the plan that fits your growing business?
-----------------------------------------------------

Our Concierge plans are tailored for larger companies that need higher traffic, domain, and user limits. With dedicated expert support and flexible add-ons, you’ll have everything you need to scale your landing page performance and drive more conversions.

[Contact sales](https://unbounce.com/concierge/)

![Image 144: concierge-plans](data:image/gif;base64)

*   ![Image 146: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 148: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 150: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 152: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 154: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 156: trustradius-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)
    
    We use Unbounce for our own landing pages, in particular when we drive paid media. I think they’ve done a great job of staying competitive while being the most tenured in the industry.
    
    ![Image 157: Josh-Aston](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    Josh Aston
    
    Chief Marketing Officer
    
*   ![Image 159: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 161: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 163: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 165: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 167: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 169: google-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)
    
    All our landing pages look just like our website, and they were created in a fraction of the time. I’ve created over 130 landing pages, and saved hundreds of hours, if not more.
    
    ![Image 170: Justin-Ulrich](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    Justin Ulrich
    
    Director of Demand Generation
    
*   ![Image 172: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 174: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 176: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 178: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 180: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 182: google-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)
    
    Unbounce has drastically increased my productivity, letting me create campaigns within 2-3 hours. Unbounce is like having a dedicated designer and developer on-hand.
    
    ![Image 183: Erik-Kielisch](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    Erik Kielisch
    
    Marketing and SEO Manager
    
*   ![Image 185: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 187: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 189: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 191: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 193: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 195: google-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)
    
    Everything about it is how it should be. It’s powerful, yet easy. I doubt you will find a better landing page solution out there. If you do, let me know about it. :)
    
    ![Image 196: William-Griggs](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    William Griggs
    
    Director of Growth at CBANC Network
    
*   ![Image 198: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 200: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 202: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 204: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 206: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 208: capterra-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)
    
    Whether you’re building your very first landing page or your 50th, you can build it from scratch or tap into Unbounce’s impressive library of 100+ templates you can select and customize in any way.
    
    ![Image 209: Yann-Ilunga](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    Yann Ilunga
    
    Marketing Consultant at 360 Entrepreneur
    
*   ![Image 211: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 213: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 215: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 217: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 219: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 221: google-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)
    
    The landing page builder is by far the best in its class. A complicated design in PSD/Sketch can be transferred to a live page within a few hours.
    
    ![Image 222: Hristian-Kambourov](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    Hristian Kambourov
    
    Head of CRO at Revise Agency
    
*   ![Image 224: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 226: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 228: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 230: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 232: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)
    
    ![Image 234: capterra-review-logo](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

    ![Image 235: Josh-Leier](data:image/gif;base64)
    
    Josh Leier
    
    Creative Director at IceHound Marketing
    
*   ![Image 237: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 239: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 241: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 243: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 245: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)

*   ![Image 250: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 252: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 254: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 256: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)![Image 258: star-review-icon](blob:http://localhost/587b14b9d4c9f9cbb2fa9cd46840882f)

Start building pages for free
-----------------------------

Build landing pages, popups, and sticky bars with your free 14-day trial. Cancel anytime.

[Start my free trial](https://unbounce.com/pricing/#start-btn)

FAQs
----

#### How does the free 14-day trial work?

Your free 14-day trial on a Build, Experiment, or Optimize plan gives you full access to all of the corresponding plan features. There are no restrictions, and you won’t be billed until after your 14-day trial is complete.

We’ll send you a reminder email near the end of your Build, Experiment, or Optimize trial to verify that you want to continue using Unbounce. If you want to cancel, you can do so at any time by logging into your Unbounce account, going to “Account Management”, selecting “Subscriptions”, and clicking “Cancel”.

#### Why do you need my credit card for the free trial?

You’ll be asked to provide your credit card information when you sign up for a free 14-day trial with our Build, Experiment, or Optimize plans. This ensures that—in the event you decide to continue using Unbounce beyond the 14-day trial period—there are no interruptions to your subscription.

You can also try Unbounce’s [interactive demo](https://preview.unbounce.com/?_gl=1*163atml*_gcl_au*NTI4MDYwODA5LjE3NDIyODI5OTY.*_ga*NTg5Mzk4MjU3LjE3NDIyODI5OTY.*_ga_8GFBJRYYE1*MTc0MjI5MDMzNC44NC4xLjE3NDIyOTI4NTAuMC4wLjA.&_ga=2.133229900.396126974.1742282996-589398257.1742282996) without providing your credit card information.

#### Can I change my plan?

You can change from a Build, Experiment, or Optimize plan by logging into your Unbounce account, going to “Account Management”, and selecting “Subscriptions”. You can upgrade to a higher-tier plan at any time, but switching to a lower-tier plan will only take effect at the end of your current billing cycle (monthly or annually).

#### How does hosting work? Can I connect my own domain?

Our Build, Experiment, and Optimize plans all include free hosting through Unbounce. You can also publish your landing pages directly to your own domain or WordPress website (in which case you’ll be responsible for hosting).

#### What counts as a conversion? What counts as a visitor?

We log a **conversion** when someone completes your assigned conversion goal on a landing page or in a popup or sticky bar. Common conversion goals include clicking a call to action button or submitting a form.

A **visitor** is a person who views your landing page, popup, or sticky bar at least once in a given month. Using cookies, we ensure each visitor only counts once toward your limit—no matter how many times they return.

#### What happens if I exceed my conversion or traffic limits?

If it looks like you’re at risk of exceeding your conversion or traffic limits, we’ll be sure to let you know by email and through in-app messages. In the event that you go over your limit, we’ll automatically upgrade you to a plan with higher limits for the next billing cycle (monthly or annual). Learn more about [what happens if you exceed limits on your plan](https://documentation.unbounce.com/hc/en-us/articles/360044911872-What-Happens-if-I-Exceed-My-Traffic-Conversion-Limit-on-My-Plan?_gl=1*1w2ny7m*_gcl_au*NTI4MDYwODA5LjE3NDIyODI5OTY.*_ga*NTg5Mzk4MjU3LjE3NDIyODI5OTY.*_ga_8GFBJRYYE1*MTc0MjI5MDMzNC44NC4xLjE3NDIyOTI4NTAuMC4wLjA.&_ga=2.209331536.396126974.1742282996-589398257.1742282996).

#### How can I access Professional Services?

Professional Service offerings such as personalized onboarding, page migrations, landing page redesign, and conversion-focused consults are available for purchase with any plan, at any time. You can learn more about these services [here](https://unbounce.com/professional-services-add-ons/).

#### Is Unbounce GDPR compliant?

Businesses are responsible for including GDPR (and/or CASL) compliance in their marketing strategy. The best way to ensure GDPR compliance is to consult with legal counsel.

Unbounce can help you align with GDPR best practices through functionality you can apply to your campaigns. For example, using our landing page builder, you can easily add checkbox fields to your forms that allow visitors to consent to your privacy and data storage practices.

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
